subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: BEIJING — Lopez Lomong, a former child prisoner in war-torn East Africa who was among the so-called Lost Boys of Sudan, will lead the United States Olympic team into the National Stadium on Friday night during the opening ceremony of the Olympics.
